definition.text: This indicator compares the price action and direction before applying volume weighting to calculate the strength of the buyers vs the strength of the sellers.

paragraphs.text: Strength finder Index on the Charts
The resulting output of this indicator shows the relative strength of the buyers vs the sellers. If a buyer's value is above 50%, then buyers currently have the higher strength.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| Strength_Finder | StrengthFinder | buyVol, sellVol, buyPerc, sellPerc |
The parameters for the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Strength Finder" Procedure Loop.
This indicator can be used as a confirmation to a primary indicator. An example of a confirmation could be when the buy volume percent is above 50:
